41 // Class Components
45 class Components {
46 
47  protected:
48 
49  // -------------------- Constants -------------------- //
50 
51 
53  const uint32 INIT_NB_ALLOCATED_COMPONENTS = 10;
54 
55  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
56 
58  MemoryAllocator& mMemoryAllocator;
59 
61  uint32 mNbComponents;
62 
64  size_t mComponentDataSize;
65 
67  uint32 mNbAllocatedComponents;
68 
70  void* mBuffer;
71 
73  Map<Entity, uint32> mMapEntityToComponentIndex;
74 
77  uint32 mDisabledStartIndex;
78 
80  uint32 prepareAddComponent(bool isSleeping);
81 
83  virtual void allocate(uint32 nbComponentsToAllocate)=0;
84 
86  virtual void destroyComponent(uint32 index);
87 
89  virtual void moveComponentToIndex(uint32 srcIndex, uint32 destIndex)=0;
90 
92  virtual void swapComponents(uint32 index1, uint32 index2)=0;
93 
94  public:
95 
96  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
97 
99  Components(MemoryAllocator& allocator, size_t componentDataSize);
100 
102  virtual ~Components();
103 
105  void removeComponent(Entity entity);
106 
108  bool getIsEntityDisabled(Entity entity) const;
109 
111  void setIsEntityDisabled(Entity entity, bool isDisabled);
112 
114  bool hasComponent(Entity entity) const;
115 
117  bool hasComponentGetIndex(Entity entity, uint32& entityIndex) const;
118 
120  uint32 getNbComponents() const;
121 
123  uint32 getNbEnabledComponents() const;
124 
126  uint32 getEntityIndex(Entity entity) const;
127 };
128 
129 // Return true if an entity is sleeping
130 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool Components::getIsEntityDisabled(Entity entity) const {
131  assert(hasComponent(entity));
132  return mMapEntityToComponentIndex[entity] >= mDisabledStartIndex;
133 }
134 
135 // Return true if there is a component for a given entity
136 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool Components::hasComponent(Entity entity) const {
137  return mMapEntityToComponentIndex.containsKey(entity);
138 }
139 
140 // Return true if there is a component for a given entiy and if so set the entity index
141 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool Components::hasComponentGetIndex(Entity entity, uint32& entityIndex) const {
142 
143  auto it = mMapEntityToComponentIndex.find(entity);
144 
145  if (it != mMapEntityToComponentIndex.end()) {
146  entityIndex = it->second;
147  return true;
148  }
149 
150  return false;
151 }
152 
153 // Return the number of components
154 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 Components::getNbComponents() const {
155  return mNbComponents;
156 }
157 
158 // Return the number of enabled components
159 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 Components::getNbEnabledComponents() const {
160  return mDisabledStartIndex;
161 }
162 
163 // Return the index in the arrays for a given entity
164 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 Components::getEntityIndex(Entity entity) const {
165  assert(hasComponent(entity));
166  return mMapEntityToComponentIndex[entity];
167 }
168 }
169
